index 0000000..a886e6e
--- /dev/null
+++ b/tests/unit/data/kiwiLocator/multiConf/config_one.kiwi
@@ -0,0 +1,41 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<image schemaversion="4.7" name="suse-11.3-vm-guest">
+	<description type="system">
+		<author>Robert Schweikert</author>
+		<contact>rschweikert at novell.com</contact>
+		<specification>Generic valid configuration file</specification>
+	</description>
+	<preferences>
+		<type image="vmx" filesystem="ext4" boot="vmxboot/suse-11.3" format="vmdk">
+			<machine memory="512">
+				<vmdisk controller="ide" id="0"/>
+				<vmnic interface="0" driver="e1000" mode="bridged"/>
+				<vmnic interface="1" driver="e1000" mode="bridged"/>
+			</machine>
+		</type>
+		<version>1.0.0</version>
+		<packagemanager>zypper</packagemanager>
+		<rpm-check-signatures>false</rpm-check-signatures>
+		<rpm-force>true</rpm-force>
+		<locale>en_US</locale>
+		<keytable>us.map.gz</keytable>
+	</preferences>
+	<users group="root">
+		<user pwd="linux" pwdformat="plain" home="/root" name="root"/>
+	</users>
+	<repository type="yast2">
+		<source path="opensuse://11.3/repo/oss/"/>
+	</repository>
+	<packages type="image">
+		<package name="bootsplash-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="gfxboot-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="kernel-default"/>
+		<package name="ifplugd"/>
+		<package name="vim"/>
+		<opensusePattern name="base"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="bootstrap">
+		<package name="filesystem"/>
+		<package name="glibc-locale"/>
+	</packages>
+</image>
diff --git a/tests/unit/data/kiwiLocator/multiConf/config_two.kiwi b/tests/unit/data/kiwiLocator/multiConf/config_two.kiwi
new file mode 100644
index 0000000..a886e6e
--- /dev/null
+++ b/tests/unit/data/kiwiLocator/multiConf/config_two.kiwi
@@ -0,0 +1,41 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<image schemaversion="4.7" name="suse-11.3-vm-guest">
+	<description type="system">
+		<author>Robert Schweikert</author>
+		<contact>rschweikert at novell.com</contact>
+		<specification>Generic valid configuration file</specification>
+	</description>
+	<preferences>
+		<type image="vmx" filesystem="ext4" boot="vmxboot/suse-11.3" format="vmdk">
+			<machine memory="512">
+				<vmdisk controller="ide" id="0"/>
+				<vmnic interface="0" driver="e1000" mode="bridged"/>
+				<vmnic interface="1" driver="e1000" mode="bridged"/>
+			</machine>
+		</type>
+		<version>1.0.0</version>
+		<packagemanager>zypper</packagemanager>
+		<rpm-check-signatures>false</rpm-check-signatures>
+		<rpm-force>true</rpm-force>
+		<locale>en_US</locale>
+		<keytable>us.map.gz</keytable>
+	</preferences>
+	<users group="root">
+		<user pwd="linux" pwdformat="plain" home="/root" name="root"/>
+	</users>
+	<repository type="yast2">
+		<source path="opensuse://11.3/repo/oss/"/>
+	</repository>
+	<packages type="image">
+		<package name="bootsplash-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="gfxboot-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="kernel-default"/>
+		<package name="ifplugd"/>
+		<package name="vim"/>
+		<opensusePattern name="base"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="bootstrap">
+		<package name="filesystem"/>
+		<package name="glibc-locale"/>
+	</packages>
+</image>
diff --git a/tests/unit/data/kiwiLocator/noConf/readme.txt b/tests/unit/data/kiwiLocator/noConf/readme.txt
new file mode 100644
index 0000000..85a8e35
--- /dev/null
+++ b/tests/unit/data/kiwiLocator/noConf/readme.txt
@@ -0,0 +1,4 @@
+Place holder file to keep this directory in version control
+
+This directory is used to check the "no config file" condition of the
+locator object
diff --git a/tests/unit/data/kiwiLocator/sglConf/config_one.kiwi b/tests/unit/data/kiwiLocator/sglConf/config_one.kiwi
new file mode 100644
index 0000000..a886e6e
--- /dev/null
+++ b/tests/unit/data/kiwiLocator/sglConf/config_one.kiwi
@@ -0,0 +1,41 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<image schemaversion="4.7" name="suse-11.3-vm-guest">
+	<description type="system">
+		<author>Robert Schweikert</author>
+		<contact>rschweikert at novell.com</contact>
+		<specification>Generic valid configuration file</specification>
+	</description>
+	<preferences>
+		<type image="vmx" filesystem="ext4" boot="vmxboot/suse-11.3" format="vmdk">
+			<machine memory="512">
+				<vmdisk controller="ide" id="0"/>
+				<vmnic interface="0" driver="e1000" mode="bridged"/>
+				<vmnic interface="1" driver="e1000" mode="bridged"/>
+			</machine>
+		</type>
+		<version>1.0.0</version>
+		<packagemanager>zypper</packagemanager>
+		<rpm-check-signatures>false</rpm-check-signatures>
+		<rpm-force>true</rpm-force>
+		<locale>en_US</locale>
+		<keytable>us.map.gz</keytable>
+	</preferences>
+	<users group="root">
+		<user pwd="linux" pwdformat="plain" home="/root" name="root"/>
+	</users>
+	<repository type="yast2">
+		<source path="opensuse://11.3/repo/oss/"/>
+	</repository>
+	<packages type="image">
+		<package name="bootsplash-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="gfxboot-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="kernel-default"/>
+		<package name="ifplugd"/>
+		<package name="vim"/>
+		<opensusePattern name="base"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="bootstrap">
+		<package name="filesystem"/>
+		<package name="glibc-locale"/>
+	</packages>
+</image>
diff --git a/tests/unit/data/xmlValidator/defaultProfileInvalid_1.xml b/tests/unit/data/xmlValidator/defaultProfileInvalid_1.xml
new file mode 100644
index 0000000..fc7c0de
--- /dev/null
+++ b/tests/unit/data/xmlValidator/defaultProfileInvalid_1.xml
@@ -0,0 +1,74 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<image schemaversion="5.1" name="suse-11.3-xen-guest">
+	<description type="system">
+		<author>Marcus SchÃ¤fer</author>
+		<contact>ms at novell.com</contact>
+		<specification>test profiles validation</specification>
+	</description>
+	<profiles>
+		<profile name="xenFlavour" description="VMX with Xen kernel" import="true"/>
+		<profile name="ec2Flavour" description="VMX with default kernel" import="true"/>
+	</profiles>
+	<preferences>
+        <type primary="true" image="oem" filesystem="ext4" boot="oemboot/suse-11.3" installiso="true" installboot="install"> 
+            <oemconfig> 
+                <oem-reboot>true</oem-reboot> 
+                <oem-swap>false</oem-swap> 
+                <oem-unattended>true</oem-unattended> 
+            </oemconfig> 
+        </type>
+		<version>1.1.2</version>
+		<packagemanager>zypper</packagemanager>
+		<rpm-check-signatures>false</rpm-check-signatures>
+		<rpm-force>true</rpm-force>
+		<locale>en_US</locale>
+		<keytable>us.map.gz</keytable>
+	</preferences>
+	<preferences profiles="xenFlavour">
+		<type image="vmx" filesystem="ext3" boot="vmxboot/suse-11.3" bootprofile="xen" bootkernel="xenk">
+			<machine memory="128" domain="domU">
+				<vmdisk controller="ide" id="0" device="/dev/xvda"/>
+				<vmnic interface="br0" mac="00:0C:6E:AA:57:2F"/>
+			</machine>
+		</type>
+	</preferences>
+	<preferences profiles="ec2Flavour">
+		<type image="vmx" filesystem="ext3" boot="vmxboot/suse-11.3" bootprofile="xen" bootkernel="ec2" format="ec2">
+			<machine memory="128" domain="domU">
+				<vmdisk controller="ide" id="0" device="/dev/xvda"/>
+				<vmnic interface="br0" mac="00:0C:6E:AA:57:2F"/>
+			</machine>
+			<ec2config>
+				<ec2privatekeyfile>Path to EC2 private key file</ec2privatekeyfile>
+				<ec2certfile>Path to EC2 public certificate file</ec2certfile>
+				<ec2accountnr>12345678911</ec2accountnr>
+			</ec2config>
+		</type>
+	</preferences>
+
+	<users group="root">
+		<user pwd="$1$wYJUgpM5$RXMMeASDc035eX.NbYWFl0" home="/root" name="root"/>
+	</users>
+	<repository type="yast2">
+		<source path="opensuse://11.3/repo/oss/"/>
+	</repository>
+	<packages type="image">
+		<package name="bootsplash-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="gfxboot-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="ifplugd"/>
+		<package name="vim"/>
+		<package name="xen-tools-domU"/>
+		<package name="xen"/>
+		<opensusePattern name="base"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="image" profiles="xenFlavour">
+		<package name="kernel-xen" replaces="kernel-ec2"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="image" profiles="ec2Flavour">
+		<package name="kernel-ec2" replaces="kernel-xen"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="bootstrap">
+		<package name="filesystem"/>
+		<package name="glibc-locale"/>
+	</packages>
+</image>

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<image schemaversion="5.1" name="suse-11.3-xen-guest">
+	<description type="system">
+		<author>Marcus SchÃ¤fer</author>
+		<contact>ms at novell.com</contact>
+		<specification>test profiles validation</specification>
+	</description>
+	<profiles>
+		<profile name="xenFlavour" description="VMX with Xen kernel" import="true"/>
+		<profile name="ec2Flavour" description="VMX with default kernel"/>
+	</profiles>
+	<preferences>
+        <type primary="true" image="oem" filesystem="ext4" boot="oemboot/suse-11.3" installiso="true" installboot="install"> 
+            <oemconfig> 
+                <oem-reboot>true</oem-reboot> 
+                <oem-swap>false</oem-swap> 
+                <oem-unattended>true</oem-unattended> 
+            </oemconfig> 
+        </type>
+		<version>1.1.2</version>
+		<packagemanager>zypper</packagemanager>
+		<rpm-check-signatures>false</rpm-check-signatures>
+		<rpm-force>true</rpm-force>
+		<locale>en_US</locale>
+		<keytable>us.map.gz</keytable>
+	</preferences>
+	<preferences profiles="xenFlavour">
+		<type image="vmx" filesystem="ext3" boot="vmxboot/suse-11.3" bootprofile="xen" bootkernel="xenk">
+			<machine memory="128" domain="domU">
+				<vmdisk controller="ide" id="0" device="/dev/xvda"/>
+				<vmnic interface="br0" mac="00:0C:6E:AA:57:2F"/>
+			</machine>
+		</type>
+	</preferences>
+	<preferences profiles="ec2Flavour">
+		<type image="vmx" filesystem="ext3" boot="vmxboot/suse-11.3" bootprofile="xen" bootkernel="ec2" format="ec2">
+			<machine memory="128" domain="domU">
+				<vmdisk controller="ide" id="0" device="/dev/xvda"/>
+				<vmnic interface="br0" mac="00:0C:6E:AA:57:2F"/>
+			</machine>
+			<ec2config>
+				<ec2privatekeyfile>Path to EC2 private key file</ec2privatekeyfile>
+				<ec2certfile>Path to EC2 public certificate file</ec2certfile>
+				<ec2accountnr>12345678911</ec2accountnr>
+			</ec2config>
+		</type>
+	</preferences>
+
+	<users group="root">
+		<user pwd="$1$wYJUgpM5$RXMMeASDc035eX.NbYWFl0" home="/root" name="root"/>
+	</users>
+	<repository type="yast2">
+		<source path="opensuse://11.3/repo/oss/"/>
+	</repository>
+	<packages type="image">
+		<package name="bootsplash-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="gfxboot-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="ifplugd"/>
+		<package name="vim"/>
+		<package name="xen-tools-domU"/>
+		<package name="xen"/>
+		<opensusePattern name="base"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="image" profiles="xenFlavour">
+		<package name="kernel-xen" replaces="kernel-ec2"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="image" profiles="ec2Flavour">
+		<package name="kernel-ec2" replaces="kernel-xen"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="bootstrap">
+		<package name="filesystem"/>
+		<package name="glibc-locale"/>
+	</packages>
+</image>

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<image schemaversion="4.9" name="suse-11.3-oem-preload">
+    <description type="system">
+        <author>Robert Schweikert</author>
+        <contact>rschweikert at novell.com</contact>
+        <specification>test profiles, no profile specified</specification>
+    </description>
+    <preferences>
+        <type image="oem" filesystem="ext4" boot="oemboot/suse-11.3" installiso="true" installboot="install">
+            <oemconfig>
+                <oem-reboot>true</oem-reboot>
+                <oem-swap>false</oem-swap>
+                <oem-unattended>true</oem-unattended>
+            </oemconfig>
+        </type>
+        <version>1.0.0</version>
+        <packagemanager>zypper</packagemanager>
+        <rpm-check-signatures>false</rpm-check-signatures>
+        <rpm-force>true</rpm-force>
+        <locale>en_US</locale>
+        <keytable>us.map.gz</keytable>
+    </preferences>
+    <users group="root">
+        <user pwd="linux" pwdformat="plain" home="/root" name="root"/>
+    </users>
+    <repository type="yast2">
+        <source path="opensuse://11.3/repo/oss/"/>
+    </repository>
+    <packages type="image" patternType="plusRecommended">
+        <package name="bootsplash-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+        <package name="gfxboot-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+        <package name="kernel-default"/>
+        <package name="vi"/>
+        <opensusePattern name="default"/>
+    </packages>
+    <packages type="bootstrap">
+        <package name="filesystem"/>
+        <package name="glibc-locale"/>
+    </packages>
+</image>

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<image schemaversion="5.1" name="suse-11.3-xen-guest">
+	<description type="system">
+		<author>Marcus SchÃ¤fer</author>
+		<contact>ms at novell.com</contact>
+		<specification>test profiles validation</specification>
+	</description>
+	<profiles>
+		<profile name="xenFlavour" description="VMX with Xen kernel" import="true"/>
+		<profile name="ec2Flavour" description="VMX with default kernel" import="false"/>
+	</profiles>
+	<preferences>
+        <type primary="true" image="oem" filesystem="ext4" boot="oemboot/suse-11.3" installiso="true" installboot="install"> 
+            <oemconfig> 
+                <oem-reboot>true</oem-reboot> 
+                <oem-swap>false</oem-swap> 
+                <oem-unattended>true</oem-unattended> 
+            </oemconfig> 
+        </type>
+		<version>1.1.2</version>
+		<packagemanager>zypper</packagemanager>
+		<rpm-check-signatures>false</rpm-check-signatures>
+		<rpm-force>true</rpm-force>
+		<locale>en_US</locale>
+		<keytable>us.map.gz</keytable>
+	</preferences>
+	<preferences profiles="xenFlavour">
+		<type image="vmx" filesystem="ext3" boot="vmxboot/suse-11.3" bootprofile="xen" bootkernel="xenk">
+			<machine memory="128" domain="domU">
+				<vmdisk controller="ide" id="0" device="/dev/xvda"/>
+				<vmnic interface="br0" mac="00:0C:6E:AA:57:2F"/>
+			</machine>
+		</type>
+	</preferences>
+	<preferences profiles="ec2Flavour">
+		<type image="vmx" filesystem="ext3" boot="vmxboot/suse-11.3" bootprofile="xen" bootkernel="ec2" format="ec2">
+			<machine memory="128" domain="domU">
+				<vmdisk controller="ide" id="0" device="/dev/xvda"/>
+				<vmnic interface="br0" mac="00:0C:6E:AA:57:2F"/>
+			</machine>
+			<ec2config>
+				<ec2privatekeyfile>Path to EC2 private key file</ec2privatekeyfile>
+				<ec2certfile>Path to EC2 public certificate file</ec2certfile>
+				<ec2accountnr>12345678911</ec2accountnr>
+			</ec2config>
+		</type>
+	</preferences>
+
+	<users group="root">
+		<user pwd="$1$wYJUgpM5$RXMMeASDc035eX.NbYWFl0" home="/root" name="root"/>
+	</users>
+	<repository type="yast2">
+		<source path="opensuse://11.3/repo/oss/"/>
+	</repository>
+	<packages type="image">
+		<package name="bootsplash-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="gfxboot-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="ifplugd"/>
+		<package name="vim"/>
+		<package name="xen-tools-domU"/>
+		<package name="xen"/>
+		<opensusePattern name="base"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="image" profiles="xenFlavour">
+		<package name="kernel-xen" replaces="kernel-ec2"/>
+	</packages>

+		<package name="kernel-ec2" replaces="kernel-xen"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="bootstrap">
+		<package name="filesystem"/>

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<image schemaversion="5.1" name="suse-11.3-xen-guest">
+	<description type="system">
+		<author>Marcus SchÃ¤fer</author>
+		<contact>ms at novell.com</contact>
+		<specification>test multiple default type per pref section</specification>
+	</description>
+	<profiles>
+		<profile name="xenFlavour" description="VMX with Xen kernel" import="true"/>
+		<profile name="ec2Flavour" description="VMX with default kernel"/>
+	</profiles>
+	<preferences>
+        <type primary="true" image="oem" filesystem="ext4" boot="oemboot/suse-11.3" installiso="true" installboot="install"> 
+            <oemconfig> 
+                <oem-reboot>true</oem-reboot> 
+                <oem-swap>false</oem-swap> 
+                <oem-unattended>true</oem-unattended> 
+            </oemconfig> 
+        </type>
+        <type primary="true" image="vmx" filesystem="ext4" boot="vmxboot/suse-11.3" format="vmdk"/>
+		<version>1.1.2</version>
+		<packagemanager>zypper</packagemanager>
+		<rpm-check-signatures>false</rpm-check-signatures>
+		<rpm-force>true</rpm-force>
+		<locale>en_US</locale>
+		<keytable>us.map.gz</keytable>
+	</preferences>
+	<preferences profiles="xenFlavour">
+		<type primary="true" image="vmx" filesystem="ext3" boot="vmxboot/suse-11.3" bootprofile="xen" bootkernel="xenk">
+			<machine memory="128" domain="domU">
+				<vmdisk controller="ide" id="0" device="/dev/xvda"/>
+				<vmnic interface="br0" mac="00:0C:6E:AA:57:2F"/>
+			</machine>
+		</type>
+        <type primary="true" image="oem" filesystem="ext4" boot="oemboot/suse-11.3" installiso="true" installboot="install"> 
+            <oemconfig> 
+                <oem-reboot>true</oem-reboot> 
+                <oem-swap>false</oem-swap> 
+                <oem-unattended>true</oem-unattended> 
+            </oemconfig> 
+        </type>
+	</preferences>
+	<preferences profiles="ec2Flavour">
+		<type primary="true" image="vmx" filesystem="ext3" boot="vmxboot/suse-11.3" bootprofile="xen" bootkernel="ec2" format="ec2">
+			<machine memory="128" domain="domU">
+				<vmdisk controller="ide" id="0" device="/dev/xvda"/>
+				<vmnic interface="br0" mac="00:0C:6E:AA:57:2F"/>
+			</machine>
+			<ec2config>
+				<ec2privatekeyfile>Path to EC2 private key file</ec2privatekeyfile>
+				<ec2certfile>Path to EC2 public certificate file</ec2certfile>
+				<ec2accountnr>12345678911</ec2accountnr>
+			</ec2config>
+		</type>
+	</preferences>
+
+	<users group="root">
+		<user pwd="$1$wYJUgpM5$RXMMeASDc035eX.NbYWFl0" home="/root" name="root"/>
+	</users>
+	<repository type="yast2">
+		<source path="opensuse://11.3/repo/oss/"/>
+	</repository>
+	<packages type="image">
+		<package name="bootsplash-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="gfxboot-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="ifplugd"/>
+		<package name="vim"/>
+		<package name="xen-tools-domU"/>
+		<package name="xen"/>
+		<opensusePattern name="base"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="image" profiles="xenFlavour">
+		<package name="kernel-xen" replaces="kernel-ec2"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="image" profiles="ec2Flavour">
+		<package name="kernel-ec2" replaces="kernel-xen"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="bootstrap">
+		<package name="filesystem"/>
+		<package name="glibc-locale"/>
+	</packages>
+</image>
diff --git a/tests/unit/data/xmlValidator/defaultTypeInvalid_2.xml b/tests/unit/data/xmlValidator/defaultTypeInvalid_2.xml
new file mode 100644
index 0000000..5bdc3bf
--- /dev/null
+++ b/tests/unit/data/xmlValidator/defaultTypeInvalid_2.xml
@@ -0,0 +1,49 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<image schemaversion="5.1" name="suse-11.3-xen-guest">
+	<description type="system">
+		<author>Marcus SchÃ¤fer</author>
+		<contact>ms at novell.com</contact>
+		<specification>test multiple default type per pref section</specification>
+	</description>
+	<preferences>
+        <type primary="true" image="oem" filesystem="ext4" boot="oemboot/suse-11.3" installiso="true" installboot="install"> 
+            <oemconfig> 
+                <oem-reboot>true</oem-reboot> 
+                <oem-swap>false</oem-swap> 
+                <oem-unattended>true</oem-unattended> 
+            </oemconfig> 
+        </type>
+        <type primary="true" image="vmx" filesystem="ext4" boot="vmxboot/suse-11.3" format="vmdk"/>
+		<version>1.1.2</version>
+		<packagemanager>zypper</packagemanager>
+		<rpm-check-signatures>false</rpm-check-signatures>
+		<rpm-force>true</rpm-force>
+		<locale>en_US</locale>
+		<keytable>us.map.gz</keytable>
+	</preferences>
+	<users group="root">
+		<user pwd="$1$wYJUgpM5$RXMMeASDc035eX.NbYWFl0" home="/root" name="root"/>
+	</users>
+	<repository type="yast2">
+		<source path="opensuse://11.3/repo/oss/"/>
+	</repository>
+	<packages type="image">
+		<package name="bootsplash-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="gfxboot-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="ifplugd"/>
+		<package name="vim"/>
+		<package name="xen-tools-domU"/>
+		<package name="xen"/>
+		<opensusePattern name="base"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="image" profiles="xenFlavour">
+		<package name="kernel-xen" replaces="kernel-ec2"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="image" profiles="ec2Flavour">
+		<package name="kernel-ec2" replaces="kernel-xen"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="bootstrap">
+		<package name="filesystem"/>
+		<package name="glibc-locale"/>
+	</packages>
+</image>
diff --git a/tests/unit/data/xmlValidator/defaultTypeValid_1.xml b/tests/unit/data/xmlValidator/defaultTypeValid_1.xml
new file mode 100644
index 0000000..68faf2d
--- /dev/null
+++ b/tests/unit/data/xmlValidator/defaultTypeValid_1.xml
@@ -0,0 +1,41 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<image schemaversion="4.9" name="suse-11.3-oem-preload">
+    <description type="system">
+        <author>Robert Schweikert</author>
+        <contact>rschweikert at novell.com</contact>
+        <specification>test default type setting</specification>
+    </description>
+    <preferences>
+        <type image="oem" filesystem="ext4" boot="oemboot/suse-11.3" installiso="true" installboot="install">
+            <oemconfig>
+                <oem-reboot>true</oem-reboot>
+                <oem-swap>false</oem-swap>
+                <oem-unattended>true</oem-unattended>
+            </oemconfig>
+        </type>
+        <type image="vmx" filesystem="ext4" boot="vmxboot/suse-11.3" format="vmdk"/>
+        <version>1.0.0</version>
+        <packagemanager>zypper</packagemanager>
+        <rpm-check-signatures>false</rpm-check-signatures>
+        <rpm-force>true</rpm-force>
+        <locale>en_US</locale>
+        <keytable>us.map.gz</keytable>
+    </preferences>
+    <users group="root">
+        <user pwd="linux" pwdformat="plain" home="/root" name="root"/>
+    </users>
+    <repository type="yast2">
+        <source path="opensuse://11.3/repo/oss/"/>
+    </repository>
+    <packages type="image" patternType="plusRecommended">
+        <package name="bootsplash-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+        <package name="gfxboot-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+        <package name="kernel-default"/>
+        <package name="vi"/>
+        <opensusePattern name="default"/>
+    </packages>
+    <packages type="bootstrap">
+        <package name="filesystem"/>
+        <package name="glibc-locale"/>
+    </packages>
+</image>
diff --git a/tests/unit/data/xmlValidator/defaultTypeValid_2.xml b/tests/unit/data/xmlValidator/defaultTypeValid_2.xml
new file mode 100644
index 0000000..47d920d
--- /dev/null
+++ b/tests/unit/data/xmlValidator/defaultTypeValid_2.xml
@@ -0,0 +1,81 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<image schemaversion="5.1" name="suse-11.3-xen-guest">
+	<description type="system">
+		<author>Marcus SchÃ¤fer</author>
+		<contact>ms at novell.com</contact>
+		<specification>test one default type per pref section</specification>
+	</description>
+	<profiles>
+		<profile name="xenFlavour" description="VMX with Xen kernel" import="true"/>
+		<profile name="ec2Flavour" description="VMX with default kernel"/>
+	</profiles>
+	<preferences>
+        <type primary="true" image="oem" filesystem="ext4" boot="oemboot/suse-11.3" installiso="true" installboot="install"> 
+            <oemconfig> 
+                <oem-reboot>true</oem-reboot> 
+                <oem-swap>false</oem-swap> 
+                <oem-unattended>true</oem-unattended> 
+            </oemconfig> 
+        </type>
+		<version>1.1.2</version>
+		<packagemanager>zypper</packagemanager>
+		<rpm-check-signatures>false</rpm-check-signatures>
+		<rpm-force>true</rpm-force>
+		<locale>en_US</locale>
+		<keytable>us.map.gz</keytable>
+	</preferences>
+	<preferences profiles="xenFlavour">
+		<type primary="true" image="vmx" filesystem="ext3" boot="vmxboot/suse-11.3" bootprofile="xen" bootkernel="xenk">
+			<machine memory="128" domain="domU">
+				<vmdisk controller="ide" id="0" device="/dev/xvda"/>
+				<vmnic interface="br0" mac="00:0C:6E:AA:57:2F"/>
+			</machine>
+		</type>
+        <type image="oem" filesystem="ext4" boot="oemboot/suse-11.3" installiso="true" installboot="install"> 
+            <oemconfig> 
+                <oem-reboot>true</oem-reboot> 
+                <oem-swap>false</oem-swap> 
+                <oem-unattended>true</oem-unattended> 
+            </oemconfig> 
+        </type>
+	</preferences>
+	<preferences profiles="ec2Flavour">
+		<type primary="true" image="vmx" filesystem="ext3" boot="vmxboot/suse-11.3" bootprofile="xen" bootkernel="ec2" format="ec2">
+			<machine memory="128" domain="domU">
+				<vmdisk controller="ide" id="0" device="/dev/xvda"/>
+				<vmnic interface="br0" mac="00:0C:6E:AA:57:2F"/>
+			</machine>
+			<ec2config>
+				<ec2privatekeyfile>Path to EC2 private key file</ec2privatekeyfile>
+				<ec2certfile>Path to EC2 public certificate file</ec2certfile>
+				<ec2accountnr>12345678911</ec2accountnr>
+			</ec2config>
+		</type>
+	</preferences>
+
+	<users group="root">
+		<user pwd="$1$wYJUgpM5$RXMMeASDc035eX.NbYWFl0" home="/root" name="root"/>
+	</users>
+	<repository type="yast2">
+		<source path="opensuse://11.3/repo/oss/"/>
+	</repository>
+	<packages type="image">
+		<package name="bootsplash-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="gfxboot-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="ifplugd"/>
+		<package name="vim"/>
+		<package name="xen-tools-domU"/>
+		<package name="xen"/>
+		<opensusePattern name="base"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="image" profiles="xenFlavour">
+		<package name="kernel-xen" replaces="kernel-ec2"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="image" profiles="ec2Flavour">
+		<package name="kernel-ec2" replaces="kernel-xen"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="bootstrap">
+		<package name="filesystem"/>
+		<package name="glibc-locale"/>
+	</packages>
+</image>

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<image schemaversion="5.1" name="suse-11.3-xen-guest">
+	<description type="system">
+		<author>Marcus SchÃ¤fer</author>
+		<contact>ms at novell.com</contact>
+		<specification>test use of default type</specification>
+	</description>
+	<profiles>
+		<profile name="xenFlavour" description="VMX with Xen kernel" import="true"/>
+		<profile name="ec2Flavour" description="VMX with default kernel"/>
+	</profiles>
+	<preferences>
+        <type primary="true" image="oem" filesystem="ext4" boot="oemboot/suse-11.3" installiso="true" installboot="install"> 
+            <oemconfig> 
+                <oem-reboot>true</oem-reboot> 
+                <oem-swap>false</oem-swap> 
+                <oem-unattended>true</oem-unattended> 
+            </oemconfig> 
+        </type>
+		<version>1.1.2</version>
+		<packagemanager>zypper</packagemanager>
+		<rpm-check-signatures>false</rpm-check-signatures>
+		<rpm-force>true</rpm-force>
+		<locale>en_US</locale>
+		<keytable>us.map.gz</keytable>
+	</preferences>
+	<preferences profiles="xenFlavour">
+		<type primary="true" image="vmx" filesystem="ext3" boot="vmxboot/suse-11.3" bootprofile="xen" bootkernel="xenk">
+			<machine memory="128" domain="domU">
+				<vmdisk controller="ide" id="0" device="/dev/xvda"/>
+				<vmnic interface="br0" mac="00:0C:6E:AA:57:2F"/>
+			</machine>
+		</type>
+        <type primary="false" image="oem" filesystem="ext4" boot="oemboot/suse-11.3" installiso="true" installboot="install"> 
+            <oemconfig> 
+                <oem-reboot>true</oem-reboot> 
+                <oem-swap>false</oem-swap> 
+                <oem-unattended>true</oem-unattended> 
+            </oemconfig> 
+        </type>
+	</preferences>
+	<preferences profiles="ec2Flavour">
+		<type primary="true" image="vmx" filesystem="ext3" boot="vmxboot/suse-11.3" bootprofile="xen" bootkernel="ec2" format="ec2">
+			<machine memory="128" domain="domU">
+				<vmdisk controller="ide" id="0" device="/dev/xvda"/>
+				<vmnic interface="br0" mac="00:0C:6E:AA:57:2F"/>
+			</machine>
+			<ec2config>
+				<ec2privatekeyfile>Path to EC2 private key file</ec2privatekeyfile>
+				<ec2certfile>Path to EC2 public certificate file</ec2certfile>
+				<ec2accountnr>12345678911</ec2accountnr>
+			</ec2config>
+		</type>
+	</preferences>
+
+	<users group="root">
+		<user pwd="$1$wYJUgpM5$RXMMeASDc035eX.NbYWFl0" home="/root" name="root"/>
+	</users>
+	<repository type="yast2">
+		<source path="opensuse://11.3/repo/oss/"/>
+	</repository>
+	<packages type="image">
+		<package name="bootsplash-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="gfxboot-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="ifplugd"/>
+		<package name="vim"/>
+		<package name="xen-tools-domU"/>
+		<package name="xen"/>
+		<opensusePattern name="base"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="image" profiles="xenFlavour">
+		<package name="kernel-xen" replaces="kernel-ec2"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="image" profiles="ec2Flavour">
+		<package name="kernel-ec2" replaces="kernel-xen"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="bootstrap">
+		<package name="filesystem"/>
+		<package name="glibc-locale"/>
+	</packages>
+</image>

+<image schemaversion="4.9" name="suse-11.3-oem-preload" displayname="my image">
+    <description type="system">
+        <author>Robert Schweikert</author>
+        <contact>rschweikert at novell.com</contact>
+        <specification>test display name value</specification>
+    </description>
+    <preferences>
+        <type image="oem" filesystem="ext4" boot="oemboot/suse-11.3" installiso="true" installboot="install">
+            <oemconfig>
+                <oem-reboot>true</oem-reboot>
+                <oem-swap>false</oem-swap>
+                <oem-unattended>true</oem-unattended>
+            </oemconfig>
+        </type>
+        <version>1.0.0</version>
+        <packagemanager>zypper</packagemanager>
+        <rpm-check-signatures>false</rpm-check-signatures>
+        <rpm-force>true</rpm-force>
+        <locale>en_US</locale>
+        <keytable>us.map.gz</keytable>
+    </preferences>
+    <users group="root">
+        <user pwd="linux" pwdformat="plain" home="/root" name="root"/>
+    </users>
+    <repository type="yast2">
+        <source path="opensuse://11.3/repo/oss/"/>
+    </repository>
+    <packages type="image" patternType="plusRecommended">
+        <package name="bootsplash-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>

+                <oem-swap>false</oem-swap>

+            </oemconfig>
+        </type>

+        <rpm-check-signatures>false</rpm-check-signatures>

+        <keytable>us.map.gz</keytable>

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<image schemaversion="5.2" name="suse-11.3-ec2-guest">
+	<description type="system">
+		<author>Marcus SchÃ¤fer</author>
+		<contact>ms at novell.com</contact>
+		<specification>test ec2region specification (same region 2x)</specification>
+	</description>
+	<preferences>
+		<version>1.1.2</version>
+		<packagemanager>zypper</packagemanager>
+		<rpm-check-signatures>false</rpm-check-signatures>
+		<rpm-force>true</rpm-force>
+		<locale>en_US</locale>
+		<keytable>us.map.gz</keytable>
+		<type image="ext3" format="ec2">
+			<ec2config>
+				<ec2privatekeyfile>Path to EC2 private key file</ec2privatekeyfile>
+				<ec2certfile>Path to EC2 public certificate file</ec2certfile>
+				<ec2accountnr>12345678911</ec2accountnr>
+                <ec2region>EU-West</ec2region>
+                <ec2region>EU-West</ec2region>
+			</ec2config>
+		</type>
+	</preferences>
+	<users group="root">
+		<user pwd="$1$wYJUgpM5$RXMMeASDc035eX.NbYWFl0" home="/root" name="root"/>
+	</users>
+	<repository type="yast2">
+		<source path="opensuse://11.3/repo/oss/"/>
+	</repository>
+    <repository type="rpm-md">
+        <source path="opensuse:Virtualization:/Cloud:/EC2/openSUSE_11.3"/>
+    </repository>
+	<packages type="image">
+		<package name="bootsplash-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="gfxboot-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="ifplugd"/>
+		<package name="kernel-ec2"/>
+        <package name="suse-ami-tools"/>
+		<package name="vim"/>
+		<package name="xen-tools-domU"/>
+		<package name="xen"/>
+		<opensusePattern name="base"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="bootstrap">
+		<package name="filesystem"/>
+		<package name="glibc-locale"/>
+	</packages>
+</image>

+				<ec2privatekeyfile>Path to EC2 private key file</ec2privatekeyfile>
+				<ec2certfile>Path to EC2 public certificate file</ec2certfile>
+				<ec2accountnr>12345678911</ec2accountnr>
+                <ec2region>EU-West</ec2region>
+                <ec2region>Ola-Region</ec2region>
+			</ec2config>
+		</type>
+	</preferences>
+	<users group="root">
+		<user pwd="$1$wYJUgpM5$RXMMeASDc035eX.NbYWFl0" home="/root" name="root"/>
+	</users>

diff --git a/tests/unit/data/xmlValidator/ec2RegionValid_2.xml b/tests/unit/data/xmlValidator/ec2RegionValid_2.xml

index 0000000..ca2e927
--- /dev/null
+++ b/tests/unit/data/xmlValidator/ec2RegionValid_2.xml
@@ -0,0 +1,48 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<image schemaversion="5.2" name="suse-11.3-ec2-guest">
+	<description type="system">
+		<author>Marcus SchÃ¤fer</author>
+		<contact>ms at novell.com</contact>
+		<specification>test ec2 region specification</specification>
+	</description>
+	<preferences>
+		<version>1.1.2</version>
+		<packagemanager>zypper</packagemanager>
+		<rpm-check-signatures>false</rpm-check-signatures>
+		<rpm-force>true</rpm-force>
+		<locale>en_US</locale>
+		<keytable>us.map.gz</keytable>
+		<type image="ext3" format="ec2">
+			<ec2config>
+				<ec2privatekeyfile>Path to EC2 private key file</ec2privatekeyfile>
+				<ec2certfile>Path to EC2 public certificate file</ec2certfile>
+				<ec2accountnr>12345678911</ec2accountnr>
+                <ec2region>EU-West</ec2region>
+			</ec2config>
+		</type>
+	</preferences>
+	<users group="root">
+		<user pwd="$1$wYJUgpM5$RXMMeASDc035eX.NbYWFl0" home="/root" name="root"/>
+	</users>
+	<repository type="yast2">
+		<source path="opensuse://11.3/repo/oss/"/>
+	</repository>
+    <repository type="rpm-md">
+        <source path="opensuse:Virtualization:/Cloud:/EC2/openSUSE_11.3"/>
+    </repository>
+	<packages type="image">
+		<package name="bootsplash-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="gfxboot-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="ifplugd"/>
+		<package name="kernel-ec2"/>
+        <package name="suse-ami-tools"/>
+		<package name="vim"/>
+		<package name="xen-tools-domU"/>
+		<package name="xen"/>
+		<opensusePattern name="base"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="bootstrap">
+		<package name="filesystem"/>
+		<package name="glibc-locale"/>
+	</packages>
+</image>

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<image schemaversion="4.7" name="suse-11.3-vm-guest">
+    <description type="system">
+        <author>Robert Schweikert</author>
+        <contact>rschweikert at novell.com</contact>
+        <specification>Generic valid configuration file</specification>
+    </description>
+    <preferences>
+        <type image="vmx" filesystem="ext4" boot="vmxboot/suse-11.3" format="vmdk">
+            <machine memory="512">
+                <vmdisk controller="ide" id="0"/>
+                <vmnic interface="0" driver="e1000" mode="bridged"/>
+                <vmnic interface="1" driver="e1000" mode="bridged"/>
+            </machine>
+        </type>
+        <version>1.0.0</version>
+        <packagemanager>zypper</packagemanager>
+        <rpm-check-signatures>false</rpm-check-signatures>
+        <rpm-force>true</rpm-force>
+        <locale>en_US</locale>
+        <keytable>us.map.gz</keytable>
+    </preferences>
+    <users group="root">
+        <user pwd="linux" pwdformat="plain" home="/root" name="root"/>
+    </users>
+    <repository type="yast2">
+        <source path="opensuse://11.3/repo/oss/"/>
+    </repository>
+    <packages type="image">
+        <package name="bootsplash-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+        <package name="gfxboot-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+        <package name="kernel-default"/>
+        <package name="ifplugd"/>
+        <package name="vim"/>
+        <opensusePattern name="base"/>
+    </packages>
+    <packages type="bootstrap">
+        <package name="filesystem"/>
+        <package name="glibc-locale"/>
+    </packages>
+</image>

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<image schemaversion="4.7" name="suse-11.3-vm-guest" kiwirevision="3">
+    <description type="system">
+        <author>Robert Schweikert</author>
+        <contact>rschweikert at novell.com</contact>
+        <specification>test revision version mismatch</specification>
+    </description>
+    <preferences>
+        <type image="vmx" filesystem="ext4" boot="vmxboot/suse-11.3" format="vmdk">
+            <machine memory="512">
+                <vmdisk controller="ide" id="0"/>
+                <vmnic interface="0" driver="e1000" mode="bridged"/>
+                <vmnic interface="1" driver="e1000" mode="bridged"/>
+            </machine>
+        </type>
+        <version>1.0.0</version>
+        <packagemanager>zypper</packagemanager>
+        <rpm-check-signatures>false</rpm-check-signatures>
+        <rpm-force>true</rpm-force>
+        <locale>en_US</locale>
+        <keytable>us.map.gz</keytable>
+    </preferences>
+    <users group="root">
+        <user pwd="linux" pwdformat="plain" home="/root" name="root"/>
+    </users>
+    <repository type="yast2">
+        <source path="opensuse://11.3/repo/oss/"/>
+    </repository>
+    <packages type="image">
+        <package name="bootsplash-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+        <package name="gfxboot-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+        <package name="kernel-default"/>
+        <package name="ifplugd"/>
+        <package name="vim"/>
+        <opensusePattern name="base"/>
+    </packages>
+    <packages type="bootstrap">
+        <package name="filesystem"/>
+        <package name="glibc-locale"/>
+    </packages>
+</image>

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<image schemaversion="4.9" name="suse-11.3-oem-preload">
+    <description type="system">
+        <author>Robert Schweikert</author>
+        <contact>rschweikert at novell.com</contact>
+        <specification>test missing filesystem attr</specification>
+    </description>
+    <preferences>
+        <type image="oem" boot="oemboot/suse-11.3" installiso="true" installboot="install">
+            <oemconfig>
+                <oem-reboot>true</oem-reboot>
+                <oem-swap>false</oem-swap>
+                <oem-unattended>true</oem-unattended>
+            </oemconfig>
+        </type>
+        <version>1.0.0</version>
+        <packagemanager>zypper</packagemanager>
+        <rpm-check-signatures>false</rpm-check-signatures>
+        <rpm-force>true</rpm-force>
+        <locale>en_US</locale>
+        <keytable>us.map.gz</keytable>
+    </preferences>
+    <users group="root">
+        <user pwd="linux" pwdformat="plain" home="/root" name="root"/>
+    </users>
+    <repository type="yast2">
+        <source path="opensuse://11.3/repo/oss/"/>
+    </repository>
+    <packages type="image" patternType="plusRecommended">
+        <package name="bootsplash-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+        <package name="gfxboot-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+        <package name="kernel-default"/>
+        <package name="vi"/>
+        <opensusePattern name="default"/>
+    </packages>
+    <packages type="bootstrap">
+        <package name="filesystem"/>
+        <package name="glibc-locale"/>
+    </packages>
+</image>

+    <description type="system">
+        <author>Robert Schweikert</author>
+        <contact>rschweikert at novell.com</contact>
+        <specification>test missing filesystem attr</specification>
+    </description>
+    <preferences>
+        <type image="oem" boot="oemboot/suse-11.3" installiso="true" installboot="install">
+            <oemconfig>
+                <oem-reboot>true</oem-reboot>
+                <oem-swap>false</oem-swap>
+                <oem-unattended>true</oem-unattended>
+            </oemconfig>
+        </type>
+        <type image="usb" boot="usbboot/suse-11.3" />
+        <type image="vmx" boot="usbboot/suse-11.3" format="vmdk"/>
+        <version>1.0.0</version>
+        <packagemanager>zypper</packagemanager>
+        <rpm-check-signatures>false</rpm-check-signatures>
+        <rpm-force>true</rpm-force>
+        <locale>en_US</locale>
+        <keytable>us.map.gz</keytable>
+    </preferences>
+    <users group="root">
+        <user pwd="linux" pwdformat="plain" home="/root" name="root"/>
+    </users>

+        <source path="opensuse://11.3/repo/oss/"/>
+    </repository>
+    <packages type="image" patternType="plusRecommended">
+        <package name="bootsplash-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+        <package name="gfxboot-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>

index 0000000..d93514e
--- /dev/null
+++ b/tests/unit/data/xmlValidator/oemPostDumpInvalid_5.xml
@@ -0,0 +1,41 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<image schemaversion="4.9" name="suse-11.3-oem-preload">
+    <description type="system">
+        <author>Robert Schweikert</author>
+        <contact>rschweikert at novell.com</contact>
+        <specification>test xml verification of post dump spec</specification>
+    </description>
+    <preferences>
+        <type image="oem" filesystem="ext4" boot="oemboot/suse-11.3" installiso="true" installboot="install">
+            <oemconfig>
+                <oem-reboot>true</oem-reboot>
+                <oem-shutdown>true</oem-shutdown>
+                <oem-swap>false</oem-swap>
+                <oem-unattended>true</oem-unattended>
+            </oemconfig>
+        </type>
+        <version>1.0.0</version>
+        <packagemanager>zypper</packagemanager>
+        <rpm-check-signatures>false</rpm-check-signatures>
+        <rpm-force>true</rpm-force>
+        <locale>en_US</locale>
+        <keytable>us.map.gz</keytable>
+    </preferences>
+    <users group="root">
+        <user pwd="linux" pwdformat="plain" home="/root" name="root"/>
+    </users>
+    <repository type="yast2">
+        <source path="opensuse://11.3/repo/oss/"/>
+    </repository>
+    <packages type="image" patternType="plusRecommended">
+        <package name="bootsplash-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+        <package name="gfxboot-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+        <package name="kernel-default"/>
+        <package name="vi"/>
+        <opensusePattern name="default"/>
+    </packages>
+    <packages type="bootstrap">
+        <package name="filesystem"/>
+        <package name="glibc-locale"/>
+    </packages>
+</image>

diff --git a/tests/unit/data/xmlValidator/patternTattrConsInvalid_1.xml b/tests/unit/data/xmlValidator/patternTattrConsInvalid_1.xml
new file mode 100644
index 0000000..ecd3503
--- /dev/null
+++ b/tests/unit/data/xmlValidator/patternTattrConsInvalid_1.xml
@@ -0,0 +1,57 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<image schemaversion="5.2" name="suse-xml-validator-test">
+	<description type="system">
+		<author>Robert Schweikert</author>
+		<contact>rschweikert at novell.</contact>
+		<specification>test patternType usage consistency, no default packages section, diff attribute values reuse profiles</specification>
+	</description>
+	<profiles>
+		<profile name="my-first" description="a first test profile"/>
+		<profile name="my-second" description="a second test profile"/>
+	</profiles>
+	<preferences>
+		<type image="vmx" primary="true" filesystem="ext4" boot="vmxboot/suse-11.3" format="vmdk">
+			<machine memory="1024">
+				<vmdisk controller="ide" id="0"/>
+			</machine>
+		</type>
+		<version>1.0.1</version>
+		<packagemanager>zypper</packagemanager>
+		<rpm-check-signatures>false</rpm-check-signatures>
+		<rpm-force>true</rpm-force>
+		<locale>en_US</locale>
+		<keytable>us.map.gz</keytable>
+	</preferences>
+	<users group="users">
+		<user pwd="$1$wYJUgpM5$RXMMeASDc035eX.NbYWFl0" home="/home/tux" name="tux"/>
+	</users>
+	<users group="root">
+		<user pwd="$1$wYJUgpM5$RXMMeASDc035eX.NbYWFl0" home="/root" name="root"/>
+	</users>
+	<repository type="yast2">
+		<source path="opensuse://11.3/repo/oss/"/>
+	</repository>
+	<packages type="image" profiles="my-first">
+		<package name="bootsplash-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="gfxboot-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="kernel-default"/>
+		<package name="ifplugd"/>
+		<package name="vim"/>
+		<opensusePattern name="base"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="image" profiles="my-second" patternType="plusRecommended">
+		<package name="bootsplash-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="gfxboot-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="kernel-default"/>
+		<package name="ifplugd"/>
+		<package name="vim"/>
+		<opensusePattern name="base"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="image" profiles="my-first,my-second">
+		<package name="yast2"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="bootstrap">
+		<package name="filesystem"/>
+		<package name="glibc-locale"/>
+	</packages>
+</image>
diff --git a/tests/unit/data/xmlValidator/patternTattrConsInvalid_2.xml b/tests/unit/data/xmlValidator/patternTattrConsInvalid_2.xml
new file mode 100644
index 0000000..b40fc12
--- /dev/null
+++ b/tests/unit/data/xmlValidator/patternTattrConsInvalid_2.xml
@@ -0,0 +1,57 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<image schemaversion="5.2" name="suse-xml-validator-test">
+	<description type="system">
+		<author>Robert Schweikert</author>
+		<contact>rschweikert at novell.</contact>
+		<specification>test patternType usage consistency, no default packages section, diff attribute values reuse profiles</specification>
+	</description>
+	<profiles>
+		<profile name="my-first" description="a first test profile"/>
+		<profile name="my-second" description="a second test profile"/>
+	</profiles>
+	<preferences>
+		<type image="vmx" primary="true" filesystem="ext4" boot="vmxboot/suse-11.3" format="vmdk">
+			<machine memory="1024">
+				<vmdisk controller="ide" id="0"/>
+			</machine>
+		</type>
+		<version>1.0.1</version>
+		<packagemanager>zypper</packagemanager>
+		<rpm-check-signatures>false</rpm-check-signatures>
+		<rpm-force>true</rpm-force>
+		<locale>en_US</locale>
+		<keytable>us.map.gz</keytable>
+	</preferences>
+	<users group="users">
+		<user pwd="$1$wYJUgpM5$RXMMeASDc035eX.NbYWFl0" home="/home/tux" name="tux"/>
+	</users>
+	<users group="root">
+		<user pwd="$1$wYJUgpM5$RXMMeASDc035eX.NbYWFl0" home="/root" name="root"/>
+	</users>
+	<repository type="yast2">
+		<source path="opensuse://11.3/repo/oss/"/>
+	</repository>
+	<packages type="image" profiles="my-first">
+		<package name="bootsplash-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="gfxboot-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="kernel-default"/>
+		<package name="ifplugd"/>
+		<package name="vim"/>
+		<opensusePattern name="base"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="image" profiles="my-second">
+		<package name="bootsplash-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="gfxboot-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="kernel-default"/>
+		<package name="ifplugd"/>
+		<package name="vim"/>
+		<opensusePattern name="base"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="image" profiles="my-first,my-second" patternType="plusRecommended">
+		<package name="yast2"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="bootstrap">
+		<package name="filesystem"/>
+		<package name="glibc-locale"/>
+	</packages>
+</image>

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<image schemaversion="5.2" name="suse-xml-validator-test">
+	<description type="system">
+		<author>Robert Schweikert</author>
+		<contact>rschweikert at novell.</contact>
+		<specification>test patternType usage consistency</specification>
+	</description>
+	<profiles>
+		<profile name="my-first" description="a first test profile"/>
+		<profile name="my-second" description="a second test profile"/>
+	</profiles>
+	<preferences>
+		<type image="vmx" primary="true" filesystem="ext4" boot="vmxboot/suse-11.3" format="vmdk">
+			<machine memory="1024">
+				<vmdisk controller="ide" id="0"/>
+			</machine>
+		</type>
+		<version>1.0.1</version>
+		<packagemanager>zypper</packagemanager>
+		<rpm-check-signatures>false</rpm-check-signatures>
+		<rpm-force>true</rpm-force>
+		<locale>en_US</locale>
+		<keytable>us.map.gz</keytable>
+	</preferences>
+	<users group="users">
+		<user pwd="$1$wYJUgpM5$RXMMeASDc035eX.NbYWFl0" home="/home/tux" name="tux"/>
+	</users>
+	<users group="root">
+		<user pwd="$1$wYJUgpM5$RXMMeASDc035eX.NbYWFl0" home="/root" name="root"/>
+	</users>
+	<repository type="yast2">
+		<source path="opensuse://11.3/repo/oss/"/>
+	</repository>
+	<packages type="image">
+		<package name="bootsplash-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="gfxboot-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="kernel-default"/>
+		<package name="ifplugd"/>
+		<package name="vim"/>
+		<opensusePattern name="base"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="image" profiles="my-second" patternType="plusRecommended">
+		<package name="bootsplash-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="gfxboot-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>

+	</description>

+		</type>

+	</preferences>

+	</users>

index 0000000..a416d47
--- /dev/null
+++ b/tests/unit/data/xmlValidator/patternTattrConsValid_1.xml
@@ -0,0 +1,54 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<image schemaversion="5.2" name="suse-xml-validator-test">
+	<description type="system">
+		<author>Robert Schweikert</author>
+		<contact>rschweikert at novell.</contact>
+		<specification>test patternType usage consistency, no default packages section, different attribute values</specification>
+	</description>
+	<profiles>
+		<profile name="my-first" description="a first test profile"/>
+		<profile name="my-second" description="a second test profile"/>
+	</profiles>
+	<preferences>
+		<type image="vmx" primary="true" filesystem="ext4" boot="vmxboot/suse-11.3" format="vmdk">
+			<machine memory="1024">
+				<vmdisk controller="ide" id="0"/>
+			</machine>
+		</type>
+		<version>1.0.1</version>
+		<packagemanager>zypper</packagemanager>
+		<rpm-check-signatures>false</rpm-check-signatures>
+		<rpm-force>true</rpm-force>
+		<locale>en_US</locale>
+		<keytable>us.map.gz</keytable>
+	</preferences>
+	<users group="users">
+		<user pwd="$1$wYJUgpM5$RXMMeASDc035eX.NbYWFl0" home="/home/tux" name="tux"/>
+	</users>
+	<users group="root">
+		<user pwd="$1$wYJUgpM5$RXMMeASDc035eX.NbYWFl0" home="/root" name="root"/>
+	</users>
+	<repository type="yast2">
+		<source path="opensuse://11.3/repo/oss/"/>
+	</repository>
+	<packages type="image" profiles="my-first" patternType="plusRecommended">
+		<package name="bootsplash-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="gfxboot-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="kernel-default"/>
+		<package name="ifplugd"/>
+		<package name="vim"/>
+		<opensusePattern name="base"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="image" profiles="my-second" patternType="onlyRequired">
+		<package name="bootsplash-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="gfxboot-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="kernel-default"/>
+		<package name="ifplugd"/>
+		<package name="vim"/>
+		<opensusePattern name="base"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="bootstrap">
+		<package name="filesystem"/>
+		<package name="glibc-locale"/>
+	</packages>
+</image>

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<image schemaversion="5.2" name="suse-xml-validator-test">
+	<description type="system">
+		<author>Robert Schweikert</author>
+		<contact>rschweikert at novell.</contact>
+		<specification>test patternType usage consistency, no default packages section, same attribute values reuse profiles</specification>
+	</description>
+	<profiles>
+		<profile name="my-first" description="a first test profile"/>
+		<profile name="my-second" description="a second test profile"/>
+	</profiles>
+	<preferences>
+		<type image="vmx" primary="true" filesystem="ext4" boot="vmxboot/suse-11.3" format="vmdk">
+			<machine memory="1024">
+				<vmdisk controller="ide" id="0"/>
+			</machine>
+		</type>

+		<rpm-force>true</rpm-force>
+		<locale>en_US</locale>
+		<keytable>us.map.gz</keytable>
+	</preferences>
+	<users group="users">

+	</users>
+	<users group="root">
+		<user pwd="$1$wYJUgpM5$RXMMeASDc035eX.NbYWFl0" home="/root" name="root"/>
+	</users>

+		<source path="opensuse://11.3/repo/oss/"/>
+	</repository>
+	<packages type="image" profiles="my-first" patternType="plusRecommended">
+		<package name="bootsplash-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="gfxboot-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="kernel-default"/>
+		<package name="ifplugd"/>
+		<package name="vim"/>
+		<opensusePattern name="base"/>
+	</packages>

+		<package name="bootsplash-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="gfxboot-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="kernel-default"/>
+		<package name="ifplugd"/>
+		<package name="vim"/>
+		<opensusePattern name="base"/>
+	</packages>

+	</packages>
+	<packages type="bootstrap">
+		<package name="filesystem"/>
+		<package name="glibc-locale"/>
+	</packages>

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<image schemaversion="5.2" name="suse-xml-validator-test">
+	<description type="system">
+		<author>Robert Schweikert</author>
+		<contact>rschweikert at novell.</contact>
+		<specification>test patternType usage consistency, no default packages section, same attribute values (default) reuse profiles</specification>
+	</description>
+	<profiles>
+		<profile name="my-first" description="a first test profile"/>
+		<profile name="my-second" description="a second test profile"/>
+	</profiles>
+	<preferences>
+		<type image="vmx" primary="true" filesystem="ext4" boot="vmxboot/suse-11.3" format="vmdk">
+			<machine memory="1024">
+				<vmdisk controller="ide" id="0"/>
+			</machine>
+		</type>
+		<version>1.0.1</version>
+		<packagemanager>zypper</packagemanager>
+		<rpm-check-signatures>false</rpm-check-signatures>
+		<rpm-force>true</rpm-force>
+		<locale>en_US</locale>
+		<keytable>us.map.gz</keytable>
+	</preferences>
+	<users group="users">
+		<user pwd="$1$wYJUgpM5$RXMMeASDc035eX.NbYWFl0" home="/home/tux" name="tux"/>
+	</users>
+	<users group="root">
+		<user pwd="$1$wYJUgpM5$RXMMeASDc035eX.NbYWFl0" home="/root" name="root"/>
+	</users>
+	<repository type="yast2">
+		<source path="opensuse://11.3/repo/oss/"/>
+	</repository>
+	<packages type="image" profiles="my-first">
+		<package name="bootsplash-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="gfxboot-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="kernel-default"/>
+		<package name="ifplugd"/>
+		<package name="vim"/>
+		<opensusePattern name="base"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="image" profiles="my-second">
+		<package name="bootsplash-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="gfxboot-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="kernel-default"/>
+		<package name="ifplugd"/>
+		<package name="vim"/>
+		<opensusePattern name="base"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="image" profiles="my-first,my-second">
+		<package name="yast2"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="bootstrap">
+		<package name="filesystem"/>
+		<package name="glibc-locale"/>
+	</packages>
+</image>

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<image schemaversion="5.2" name="suse-xml-validator-test">
+	<description type="system">
+		<author>Robert Schweikert</author>
+		<contact>rschweikert at novell.</contact>
+		<specification>test patternType usage consistency</specification>
+	</description>
+	<profiles>
+		<profile name="my-first" description="a first test profile"/>
+		<profile name="my-second" description="a second test profile"/>
+	</profiles>
+	<preferences>
+		<type image="vmx" primary="true" filesystem="ext4" boot="vmxboot/suse-11.3" format="vmdk">
+			<machine memory="1024">
+				<vmdisk controller="ide" id="0"/>
+			</machine>
+		</type>
+		<version>1.0.1</version>
+		<packagemanager>zypper</packagemanager>
+		<rpm-check-signatures>false</rpm-check-signatures>
+		<rpm-force>true</rpm-force>
+		<locale>en_US</locale>
+		<keytable>us.map.gz</keytable>
+	</preferences>
+	<users group="users">
+		<user pwd="$1$wYJUgpM5$RXMMeASDc035eX.NbYWFl0" home="/home/tux" name="tux"/>
+	</users>
+	<users group="root">
+		<user pwd="$1$wYJUgpM5$RXMMeASDc035eX.NbYWFl0" home="/root" name="root"/>
+	</users>
+	<repository type="yast2">
+		<source path="opensuse://11.3/repo/oss/"/>
+	</repository>
+	<packages type="image">
+		<package name="bootsplash-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="gfxboot-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="kernel-default"/>
+		<package name="ifplugd"/>
+		<package name="vim"/>
+		<opensusePattern name="base"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="image" profiles="my-second">
+		<package name="bootsplash-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="gfxboot-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="kernel-default"/>
+		<package name="ifplugd"/>
+		<package name="vim"/>
+		<opensusePattern name="base"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="bootstrap">
+		<package name="filesystem"/>
+		<package name="glibc-locale"/>
+	</packages>
+</image>
diff --git a/tests/unit/data/xmlValidator/patternTattrUseInvalid_1.xml b/tests/unit/data/xmlValidator/patternTattrUseInvalid_1.xml
new file mode 100644
index 0000000..839f81b
--- /dev/null
+++ b/tests/unit/data/xmlValidator/patternTattrUseInvalid_1.xml
@@ -0,0 +1,45 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<image schemaversion="4.9" name="suse-11.3-oem-preload">
+    <description type="system">
+        <author>Robert Schweikert</author>
+        <contact>rschweikert at novell.com</contact>
+        <specification>test use of patternType attribute</specification>
+    </description>
+    <preferences>
+        <type image="oem" filesystem="ext4" boot="oemboot/suse-11.3" installiso="true" installboot="install">
+            <oemconfig>
+                <oem-reboot>true</oem-reboot>
+                <oem-swap>false</oem-swap>
+                <oem-unattended>true</oem-unattended>
+            </oemconfig>
+        </type>
+        <type image="vmx" filesystem="ext4" boot="vmxboot/suse-11.3" format="vmdk"/>
+        <version>1.0.0</version>
+        <packagemanager>zypper</packagemanager>
+        <rpm-check-signatures>false</rpm-check-signatures>
+        <rpm-force>true</rpm-force>
+        <locale>en_US</locale>
+        <keytable>us.map.gz</keytable>
+    </preferences>
+    <users group="root">
+        <user pwd="linux" pwdformat="plain" home="/root" name="root"/>
+    </users>
+    <repository type="yast2">
+        <source path="opensuse://11.3/repo/oss/"/>
+    </repository>
+    <packages type="image" patternType="plusRecommended">
+        <package name="bootsplash-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+        <package name="gfxboot-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+        <package name="kernel-default"/>
+        <package name="vi"/>
+        <opensusePattern name="default"/>
+    </packages>
+    <packages type="bootstrap" patternType="plusRecommended">
+        <package name="filesystem"/>
+        <package name="glibc-locale"/>
+    </packages>
+    <packages type="delete" patternType="plusRecommended">
+        <package name="evolution"/>
+        <package name="firefox"/>
+    </packages>
+</image>
diff --git a/tests/unit/data/xmlValidator/patternTattrUseValid_1.xml b/tests/unit/data/xmlValidator/patternTattrUseValid_1.xml
new file mode 100644
index 0000000..0c1c5fd
--- /dev/null
+++ b/tests/unit/data/xmlValidator/patternTattrUseValid_1.xml
@@ -0,0 +1,41 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<image schemaversion="4.9" name="suse-11.3-oem-preload">
+    <description type="system">
+        <author>Robert Schweikert</author>
+        <contact>rschweikert at novell.com</contact>
+        <specification>test use of patternType attribute</specification>
+    </description>
+    <preferences>
+        <type image="oem" filesystem="ext4" boot="oemboot/suse-11.3" installiso="true" installboot="install">
+            <oemconfig>
+                <oem-reboot>true</oem-reboot>
+                <oem-swap>false</oem-swap>
+                <oem-unattended>true</oem-unattended>
+            </oemconfig>
+        </type>
+        <type image="vmx" filesystem="ext4" boot="vmxboot/suse-11.3" format="vmdk"/>
+        <version>1.0.0</version>
+        <packagemanager>zypper</packagemanager>
+        <rpm-check-signatures>false</rpm-check-signatures>
+        <rpm-force>true</rpm-force>
+        <locale>en_US</locale>
+        <keytable>us.map.gz</keytable>
+    </preferences>
+    <users group="root">
+        <user pwd="linux" pwdformat="plain" home="/root" name="root"/>
+    </users>
+    <repository type="yast2">
+        <source path="opensuse://11.3/repo/oss/"/>
+    </repository>
+    <packages type="image" patternType="plusRecommended">
+        <package name="bootsplash-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+        <package name="gfxboot-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+        <package name="kernel-default"/>
+        <package name="vi"/>
+        <opensusePattern name="default"/>
+    </packages>
+    <packages type="bootstrap">
+        <package name="filesystem"/>
+        <package name="glibc-locale"/>
+    </packages>
+</image>

+    </description>

+                <oem-reboot>true</oem-reboot>
+                <oem-swap>false</oem-swap>
+                <oem-unattended>true</oem-unattended>
+            </oemconfig>
+        </type>

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<image schemaversion="4.9" name="suse-11.3-oem-preload">
+    <description type="system">
+        <author>Robert Schweikert</author>
+        <contact>rschweikert at novell.com</contact>
+        <specification>test preferences consistency, two non profile reference sections</specification>
+    </description>
+    <preferences>
+        <type image="oem" filesystem="ext4" boot="oemboot/suse-11.3" installiso="true" installboot="install">
+            <oemconfig>
+                <oem-bootwait>true</oem-bootwait>
+                <oem-swap>false</oem-swap>
+                <oem-unattended>true</oem-unattended>
+            </oemconfig>
+        </type>
+        <version>1.0.0</version>
+        <packagemanager>zypper</packagemanager>
+   </preferences>
+   <preferences>
+        <rpm-check-signatures>false</rpm-check-signatures>
+        <rpm-force>true</rpm-force>
+        <locale>en_US</locale>
+        <keytable>us.map.gz</keytable>
+    </preferences>
+    <users group="root">
+        <user pwd="linux" pwdformat="plain" home="/root" name="root"/>
+    </users>
+    <repository type="yast2">
+        <source path="opensuse://11.3/repo/oss/"/>
+    </repository>
+    <packages type="image" patternType="plusRecommended">
+        <package name="bootsplash-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+        <package name="gfxboot-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+        <package name="kernel-default"/>
+        <package name="vi"/>
+        <opensusePattern name="default"/>
+    </packages>
+    <packages type="bootstrap">
+        <package name="filesystem"/>
+        <package name="glibc-locale"/>
+    </packages>
+</image>
diff --git a/tests/unit/data/xmlValidator/preferenceUniqueInvalid_2.xml b/tests/unit/data/xmlValidator/preferenceUniqueInvalid_2.xml
new file mode 100644
index 0000000..3157729
--- /dev/null
+++ b/tests/unit/data/xmlValidator/preferenceUniqueInvalid_2.xml
@@ -0,0 +1,74 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<image schemaversion="5.1" name="suse-11.3-xen-guest">
+	<description type="system">
+		<author>Marcus SchÃ¤fer</author>
+		<contact>ms at novell.com</contact>
+		<specification>test preferences consistency, ref same profile twice</specification>
+	</description>
+	<profiles>
+		<profile name="xenFlavour" description="VMX with Xen kernel" import="true"/>
+		<profile name="ec2Flavour" description="VMX with default kernel"/>
+	</profiles>
+	<preferences>
+        <type primary="true" image="oem" filesystem="ext4" boot="oemboot/suse-11.3" installiso="true" installboot="install"> 
+            <oemconfig> 
+                <oem-reboot>true</oem-reboot> 
+                <oem-swap>false</oem-swap> 
+                <oem-unattended>true</oem-unattended> 
+            </oemconfig> 
+        </type>
+		<version>1.1.2</version>
+		<packagemanager>zypper</packagemanager>
+		<rpm-check-signatures>false</rpm-check-signatures>
+		<rpm-force>true</rpm-force>
+		<locale>en_US</locale>
+		<keytable>us.map.gz</keytable>
+	</preferences>
+	<preferences profiles="xenFlavour">
+		<type image="vmx" filesystem="ext3" boot="vmxboot/suse-11.3" bootprofile="xen" bootkernel="xenk">
+			<machine memory="128" domain="domU">
+				<vmdisk controller="ide" id="0" device="/dev/xvda"/>
+				<vmnic interface="br0" mac="00:0C:6E:AA:57:2F"/>
+			</machine>
+		</type>
+	</preferences>
+	<preferences profiles="xenFlavour">
+		<type image="vmx" filesystem="ext3" boot="vmxboot/suse-11.3" bootprofile="xen" bootkernel="ec2" format="ec2">
+			<machine memory="128" domain="domU">
+				<vmdisk controller="ide" id="0" device="/dev/xvda"/>
+				<vmnic interface="br0" mac="00:0C:6E:AA:57:2F"/>
+			</machine>
+			<ec2config>
+				<ec2privatekeyfile>Path to EC2 private key file</ec2privatekeyfile>
+				<ec2certfile>Path to EC2 public certificate file</ec2certfile>
+				<ec2accountnr>12345678911</ec2accountnr>
+			</ec2config>
+		</type>
+	</preferences>
+
+	<users group="root">
+		<user pwd="$1$wYJUgpM5$RXMMeASDc035eX.NbYWFl0" home="/root" name="root"/>
+	</users>
+	<repository type="yast2">
+		<source path="opensuse://11.3/repo/oss/"/>
+	</repository>
+	<packages type="image">
+		<package name="bootsplash-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="gfxboot-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="ifplugd"/>
+		<package name="vim"/>
+		<package name="xen-tools-domU"/>
+		<package name="xen"/>
+		<opensusePattern name="base"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="image" profiles="xenFlavour">
+		<package name="kernel-xen" replaces="kernel-ec2"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="image" profiles="ec2Flavour">
+		<package name="kernel-ec2" replaces="kernel-xen"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="bootstrap">
+		<package name="filesystem"/>
+		<package name="glibc-locale"/>
+	</packages>
+</image>
diff --git a/tests/unit/data/xmlValidator/preferenceUniqueValid_1.xml b/tests/unit/data/xmlValidator/preferenceUniqueValid_1.xml
new file mode 100644
index 0000000..d6d6b04
--- /dev/null
+++ b/tests/unit/data/xmlValidator/preferenceUniqueValid_1.xml
@@ -0,0 +1,74 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<image schemaversion="5.1" name="suse-11.3-xen-guest">
+	<description type="system">
+		<author>Marcus SchÃ¤fer</author>
+		<contact>ms at novell.com</contact>
+		<specification>test preference section uniqueness</specification>
+	</description>
+	<profiles>
+		<profile name="xenFlavour" description="VMX with Xen kernel" import="true"/>
+		<profile name="ec2Flavour" description="VMX with default kernel"/>
+	</profiles>
+	<preferences>
+        <type primary="true" image="oem" filesystem="ext4" boot="oemboot/suse-11.3" installiso="true" installboot="install"> 
+            <oemconfig> 
+                <oem-reboot>true</oem-reboot> 
+                <oem-swap>false</oem-swap> 
+                <oem-unattended>true</oem-unattended> 
+            </oemconfig> 
+        </type>
+		<version>1.1.2</version>
+		<packagemanager>zypper</packagemanager>
+		<rpm-check-signatures>false</rpm-check-signatures>
+		<rpm-force>true</rpm-force>
+		<locale>en_US</locale>
+		<keytable>us.map.gz</keytable>
+	</preferences>
+	<preferences profiles="xenFlavour">
+		<type image="vmx" filesystem="ext3" boot="vmxboot/suse-11.3" bootprofile="xen" bootkernel="xenk">
+			<machine memory="128" domain="domU">
+				<vmdisk controller="ide" id="0" device="/dev/xvda"/>
+				<vmnic interface="br0" mac="00:0C:6E:AA:57:2F"/>
+			</machine>
+		</type>
+	</preferences>
+	<preferences profiles="ec2Flavour">
+		<type image="vmx" filesystem="ext3" boot="vmxboot/suse-11.3" bootprofile="xen" bootkernel="ec2" format="ec2">
+			<machine memory="128" domain="domU">
+				<vmdisk controller="ide" id="0" device="/dev/xvda"/>
+				<vmnic interface="br0" mac="00:0C:6E:AA:57:2F"/>
+			</machine>
+			<ec2config>
+				<ec2privatekeyfile>Path to EC2 private key file</ec2privatekeyfile>
+				<ec2certfile>Path to EC2 public certificate file</ec2certfile>
+				<ec2accountnr>12345678911</ec2accountnr>
+			</ec2config>
+		</type>
+	</preferences>
+
+	<users group="root">
+		<user pwd="$1$wYJUgpM5$RXMMeASDc035eX.NbYWFl0" home="/root" name="root"/>
+	</users>
+	<repository type="yast2">
+		<source path="opensuse://11.3/repo/oss/"/>
+	</repository>
+	<packages type="image">
+		<package name="bootsplash-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="gfxboot-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="ifplugd"/>
+		<package name="vim"/>
+		<package name="xen-tools-domU"/>
+		<package name="xen"/>
+		<opensusePattern name="base"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="image" profiles="xenFlavour">
+		<package name="kernel-xen" replaces="kernel-ec2"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="image" profiles="ec2Flavour">
+		<package name="kernel-ec2" replaces="kernel-xen"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="bootstrap">
+		<package name="filesystem"/>
+		<package name="glibc-locale"/>
+	</packages>
+</image>

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<image schemaversion="5.1" name="suse-11.3-xen-guest">
+	<description type="system">
+		<author>Marcus SchÃ¤fer</author>
+		<contact>ms at novell.com</contact>
+		<specification>test profile name validation</specification>
+	</description>
+	<profiles>
+		<profile name="xen Flavour" description="VMX with Xen kernel" import="true"/>
+	</profiles>
+	<preferences>
+		<type primary="true" image="oem" filesystem="ext4" boot="oemboot/suse-11.3" installiso="true" installboot="install"> 
+			<oemconfig> 
+				<oem-reboot>true</oem-reboot> 
+				<oem-swap>false</oem-swap> 
+				<oem-unattended>true</oem-unattended> 
+			</oemconfig> 
+		</type>
+		<version>1.1.2</version>
+		<packagemanager>zypper</packagemanager>
+		<rpm-check-signatures>false</rpm-check-signatures>
+		<rpm-force>true</rpm-force>
+		<locale>en_US</locale>
+		<keytable>us.map.gz</keytable>
+	</preferences>
+	<preferences profiles="xen Flavour">
+		<type image="vmx" filesystem="ext3" boot="vmxboot/suse-11.3" bootprofile="xen" bootkernel="xenk">
+			<machine memory="128" domain="domU">
+				<vmdisk controller="ide" id="0" device="/dev/xvda"/>
+				<vmnic interface="br0" mac="00:0C:6E:AA:57:2F"/>
+			</machine>
+		</type>
+	</preferences>
+	<users group="root">
+		<user pwd="$1$wYJUgpM5$RXMMeASDc035eX.NbYWFl0" home="/root" name="root"/>
+	</users>
+	<repository type="yast2">
+		<source path="opensuse://11.3/repo/oss/"/>
+	</repository>
+	<packages type="image">
+		<package name="bootsplash-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="gfxboot-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>

+	</packages>

+				<oem-reboot>true</oem-reboot>

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<image schemaversion="5.1" name="suse-11.3-xen-guest">
+	<description type="system">
+		<author>Robert Schweikert</author>
+		<contact>rschweikert at novell.com</contact>
+		<specification>test profile cross references</specification>
+	</description>
+	<preferences>
+        <type primary="true" image="oem" filesystem="ext4" boot="oemboot/suse-11.3" installiso="true" installboot="install"> 
+            <oemconfig> 
+                <oem-reboot>true</oem-reboot> 
+                <oem-swap>false</oem-swap> 
+                <oem-unattended>true</oem-unattended> 
+            </oemconfig> 
+        </type>
+		<version>1.1.2</version>
+		<packagemanager>zypper</packagemanager>
+		<rpm-check-signatures>false</rpm-check-signatures>
+		<rpm-force>true</rpm-force>
+		<locale>en_US</locale>
+		<keytable>us.map.gz</keytable>
+	</preferences>
+	<preferences profiles="xenFlavour">
+		<type image="vmx" filesystem="ext3" boot="vmxboot/suse-11.3" bootprofile="xen" bootkernel="xenk">
+			<machine memory="128" domain="domU">
+				<vmdisk controller="ide" id="0" device="/dev/xvda"/>
+				<vmnic interface="br0" mac="00:0C:6E:AA:57:2F"/>
+			</machine>
+		</type>
+	</preferences>
+	<preferences profiles="ec2Flavour">
+		<type image="vmx" filesystem="ext3" boot="vmxboot/suse-11.3" bootprofile="xen" bootkernel="ec2" format="ec2">
+			<machine memory="128" domain="domU">
+				<vmdisk controller="ide" id="0" device="/dev/xvda"/>
+				<vmnic interface="br0" mac="00:0C:6E:AA:57:2F"/>
+			</machine>
+			<ec2config>
+				<ec2privatekeyfile>Path to EC2 private key file</ec2privatekeyfile>
+				<ec2certfile>Path to EC2 public certificate file</ec2certfile>
+				<ec2accountnr>12345678911</ec2accountnr>
+			</ec2config>
+		</type>
+	</preferences>
+
+	<users group="root">
+		<user pwd="$1$wYJUgpM5$RXMMeASDc035eX.NbYWFl0" home="/root" name="root"/>
+	</users>
+	<repository type="yast2">
+		<source path="opensuse://11.3/repo/oss/"/>
+	</repository>
+	<packages type="image">
+		<package name="bootsplash-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="gfxboot-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>

+	</description>

+            <oemconfig> 
+                <oem-reboot>true</oem-reboot> 
+                <oem-swap>false</oem-swap> 
+                <oem-unattended>true</oem-unattended> 
+            </oemconfig> 
+        </type>

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<image schemaversion="5.1" name="suse-11.3-xen-guest">
+	<description type="system">
+		<author>Robert Schweikert</author>
+		<contact>rschweikert at novell.com</contact>
+		<specification>test profile cross references</specification>
+	</description>
+	<preferences>
+        <type primary="true" image="oem" filesystem="ext4" boot="oemboot/suse-11.3" installiso="true" installboot="install"> 
+            <oemconfig> 
+                <oem-reboot>true</oem-reboot> 
+                <oem-swap>false</oem-swap> 
+                <oem-unattended>true</oem-unattended> 
+            </oemconfig> 
+        </type>
+		<version>1.1.2</version>
+		<packagemanager>zypper</packagemanager>
+		<rpm-check-signatures>false</rpm-check-signatures>
+		<rpm-force>true</rpm-force>
+		<locale>en_US</locale>
+		<keytable>us.map.gz</keytable>
+	</preferences>
+	<users group="root">
+		<user pwd="$1$wYJUgpM5$RXMMeASDc035eX.NbYWFl0" home="/root" name="root"/>
+	</users>
+	<repository type="yast2" profiles="ola">
+		<source path="opensuse://11.3/repo/oss/"/>
+	</repository>
+    <drivers profiles="ola" type="drivers">
+        <file name="myDriver"/>
+    </drivers>
+	<packages type="image">
+		<package name="bootsplash-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="gfxboot-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+		<package name="ifplugd"/>
+		<package name="vim"/>
+		<package name="xen-tools-domU"/>
+		<package name="xen"/>
+		<opensusePattern name="base"/>
+	</packages>
+	<packages type="bootstrap">
+		<package name="filesystem"/>
+		<package name="glibc-locale"/>
+	</packages>
+</image>
diff --git a/tests/unit/data/xmlValidator/profileReferenceExistValid_1.xml b/tests/unit/data/xmlValidator/profileReferenceExistValid_1.xml
new file mode 100644
index 0000000..cf43b4b
--- /dev/null
+++ b/tests/unit/data/xmlValidator/profileReferenceExistValid_1.xml
@@ -0,0 +1,47 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<image schemaversion="4.7" name="suse-11.3-vm-guest">
+    <description type="system">
+        <author>Robert Schweikert</author>
+        <contact>rschweikert at novell.com</contact>
+        <specification>test profiles reference</specification>
+    </description>
+    <profiles>
+        <profile name="ola" description="a test profile"/>
+    </profiles>
+    <preferences>
+        <type image="vmx" filesystem="ext4" boot="vmxboot/suse-11.3" format="vmdk">
+            <machine memory="512">
+                <vmdisk controller="ide" id="0"/>
+                <vmnic interface="0" driver="e1000" mode="bridged"/>
+                <vmnic interface="1" driver="e1000" mode="bridged"/>
+            </machine>
+        </type>
+        <version>1.0.0</version>
+        <packagemanager>zypper</packagemanager>
+        <rpm-check-signatures>false</rpm-check-signatures>
+        <rpm-force>true</rpm-force>
+        <locale>en_US</locale>
+        <keytable>us.map.gz</keytable>
+    </preferences>
+    <users group="root">
+        <user pwd="linux" pwdformat="plain" home="/root" name="root"/>
+    </users>
+    <repository type="yast2">
+        <source path="opensuse://11.3/repo/oss/"/>
+    </repository>
+    <packages type="image">
+        <package name="bootsplash-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+        <package name="gfxboot-branding-openSUSE" bootinclude="true" bootdelete="true"/>
+        <package name="kernel-default"/>
+        <package name="ifplugd"/>
+        <package name="vim"/>
+        <opensusePattern name="base"/>
+    </packages>
+    <packages type="image" profiles="ola">
+        <package name="yast2"/>
+    </packages>
+    <packages type="bootstrap">
+        <package name="filesystem"/>
+        <package name="glibc-locale"/>
+    </packages>
+</image>
diff --git a/tests/unit/data/xmlValidator/revision.txt b/tests/unit/data/xmlValidator/revision.txt
new file mode 100644
index 0000000..d00491f
--- /dev/null
+++ b/tests/unit/data/xmlValidator/revision.txt
@@ -0,0 +1 @@
+1
